roleset.name: give
roleset.note: IMPART-V NOTES: Frames file for 'impart' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from impart.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: Policy makers regard the youth wage as helping to limit the loss of jobs from an increase in the minimum wage, but they have lately touted it-1 as necessary *trace*-1 to help *trace*-1 impart job skills to entrants into the work force.
example.arg: to entrants into the work force
